content.prompt: The Romantic movement in late-eighteenth- and early-nineteenth-century Europe was characterized by

choices.label: reaction against the principles of the Enlightenment
a view of the natural world as a "machine"

unit.text: 5: Conflict, Crisis, and Reaction in the Late 18th Century

skill.text: Skill 5.A: Identify patterns among or connections between historical developments and processes.
